short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clean your chrome tabs when sharing your screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CleanSlate is your perfect companion for maintaining privacy during meetings and screen-sharing sessions. With this extension, you can automatically hide your Chrome tabs whenever you're in a meeting or screen-sharing mode, ensuring your personal browsing remains confidential and distraction-free.
